A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Excellent film\, and what a great way to see Luke Skywalker help push the Resistance onward with a final standoff with Kylo Ren.  The Star Wars series is now about the new chapters\, the new challenges\, and the new characters.  I welcome how much the series has opened up as a result of these last two movies.  I am also eager to learn more about Kylo Ren\, Rey\, and certain sub-series in the making.
